content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 2, Villarreal 1.
Diego López (Villarreal) is shown the yellow card.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 2, Villarreal 1.
Goal!  Manchester City 2, Villarreal 1. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by David Silva.
Attempt missed. David Silva (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Pablo Zabaleta with a cross.
Mario Gaspar (Villarreal) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt saved. Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by James Milner with a cross.
Marcos Gullón (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Edin Dzeko (Manchester City).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Borja Valero.
Substitution, Villarreal. Marcos Gullón replaces Jonathan de Guzmán.
Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Aleksandar Kolarov with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Mubarak Wakaso (Villarreal) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Borja Valero.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Pablo Zabaleta.
Substitution, Villarreal. Mario Gaspar replaces Cani.
Foul by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Mubarak Wakaso (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Manchester City. Yaya Touré tries a through ball, but Sergio Agüero is caught offside.
Substitution, Manchester City. James Milner replaces Samir Nasri.
Substitution, Villarreal. Mubarak Wakaso replaces Hernán Pérez.
Foul by Carlos Marchena (Villarreal).

Attempt missed. Jonathan de Guzmán (Villarreal) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a set piece situation.
Foul by David Silva (Manchester City).
Catalá (Villarreal) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Hand ball by Edin Dzeko (Manchester City).
Attempt missed. Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.
Foul by Borja Valero (Villarreal).
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Catalá (Villarreal) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Hernán Pérez.
Foul by Borja Valero (Villarreal).
Yaya Touré (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Giuseppe Rossi (Villarreal) is shown the yellow card.
Giuseppe Rossi (Villarreal) has gone down, but that's a dive.
Offside, Manchester City. Pablo Zabaleta tries a through ball, but Sergio Agüero is caught offside.
Offside, Villarreal. Borja Valero tries a through ball, but Jonathan de Guzmán is caught offside.
Jonathan de Guzmán (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Yaya Touré (Manchester City).
Substitution, Manchester City. Sergio Agüero replaces Nigel de Jong.
Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonathan de Guzmán (Villarreal).
Attempt saved. Cristian  Zapata (Villarreal) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Borja Valero.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Hernán Pérez (Villarreal) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Aleksandar Kolarov with a cross.

Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Vincent Kompany.
Attempt saved. Giuseppe Rossi (Villarreal) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cani with a through ball.

Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Diego López.
